thread.title: NY getaway with the whole family
thread.title_full: NY getaway with the whole family - Review of Hotel Chandler, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Antonio M
title: NY getaway with the whole family
text: We were a party of 12 and the staff at the Chandler were always helpfull. We would like to specially mention a girl at the front desk, Susan, always smiling and providing help. If I had to mention something to improve I would say the elevators, sometimes too slow, but we were on vacation, so who cares
